flows.description:
Flow to trigger a standard Authentication experience, which includes:
Standard Username/Password Login
Gateway Migration
Kerberos Authentication
Passwordless Login
Change Password
Forgot Password
Forgot Username

nodeDescription.value: Input Action of either START or END
Create the PingOne Protect Risk Evaluation. This will read the fingerprint previously on the user to create a score to dictate the users journey
Based on the ouput of the Evaluate Risk Node, what was the score? This Node will help determine that and send the end user down the correct path.
Based on the from the MFA Journey, complete the users Risk Evaluation with a success if the user authenticated through MFA. And a fail if the user failed in the MFA Journey
Begin the MFA experience for the End User
Begin the MFA experience for the End User
Did we successfully complete the Risk evaluation. Or was the final results a FAILURE
User was successful, send the user down the true branch with the appropriate attributes
With No score being detected. The users journey will end here with a FAILED Risk
Did the PingOne Protect score detect it was any Fraud attack, if so fail the user. Otherwise, allow them to continue the journey
With BOT being detected. The users journey will end here with a SUCCESS for a successful stopped attempt of Risk
